preTriggerContent.text: There is very nice carpeting in this room. A carved wooden statue of a dog sits against the East wall. It's tail is sticking upright.

triggerContent.text: Upon closer examination of the carpet and the dog statue, you notice that the tail is a lever and pull it. It breaks off and disappears! A door appears to the East.

postTriggerContent.text: There is very nice carpeting in this room. A carved wooden statue of a dog with it's tail missing sits against the East wall.
